main.name: Anastasia Orlova
main.bio: Full stack web developer experienced in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript based programming with a background in retail and social work. Possess strong client service, leadership and teamwork skills. Transformed my passion for learning foreign languages and creative writing into programming languages studies and tech blogging. An active, inspired learner, committed to social justice and LGBT rights.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: Rothberg International School at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem

work.title: Assistant Program Coordinator
work.description: Organized and managed weekly events and distributed information to groups of 20-30 members, provided translation and interpretation services for guest, speakers and members, moderated Facebook Russian LGBT Support Group of over 300 members

work.title: Personal Stylist assistant; Stock assistant
work.description: Increased sales by 15%, managed appointments and communications with 20 VIP clients in a timely manner, promoted from Stock assistant to Personal Stylist assistant in December 2018, received a reward for extraordinary service - BG STAR in August 2018

work.title: Mentor and Event Coordinator
work.description: Coordinated Russian Speaking LGBT Pride known as Brighton Beach Pride in 2017 and 2018 which was attended by more than 300 participants, provided mentorship support for Russian speaking LGBT community within the Mentorship program, coordinated and organized translation and interpretation services for Legal Clinic groups of up to 30 members

work.title: Sales And Marketing Specialist
work.description: Consulted customers on their perfumery needs and determined their buying preferences to stimulate customers for making orders, provided additional information about store policy, processed orders

projects.title: Chanel Handbag Picker
projects.category: A showcase app that helps you find a perfect style of Chanel Handbag

projects.title: Pagan Sanctuary
projects.category: Meet Pagan Sanctuary - an app that shares info about pagan holidays and other esotheric topics!

projects.title: Game Of Thrones Quote For A Day
projects.category: An app that generates a random quote from “Game of thrones” TV series based on “A Song Of Ice And Fire” by George R.R. Martin.
